program.name: python -m ep_bolfi.kadi_tools.read_measurement_from_parquet
program.description: Please refer to the --help output of this file.

param.description: Persistent record identifier to download the file from.
param.name: record

param.description: File name of the Parquet file to download.
param.name: filename

param.description: Type of the measurement, which determines the internal format for further processing. 'cycling' refers to Cycling_Information, 'static' to Static_Information' and 'impedance' to Impedance_Information. If you are unsure which to pick, consult the package documentation.
param.name: datatype

param.description: Toggle to replace the indices attribute with (0, ..., len(data) - 1).
param.name: arg-indices
